item.title: http-to-https.conf
item.description: Download # application server { server_name my-app.com; listen [::]:443 ssl http2 default_server ipv6only=on; listen 443 ssl http2 default_server; ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/my-app.com/fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/my-app.com/privkey.pem; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main; return 200 "hello world"; } # www-to-naked server { server_name www.my-app.com; listen [::]:443 ssl http2 default_server ipv6only=on; listen 443 ssl http2 default_server; ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/my-app.com/fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/my-app.com/privkey.pem; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main; return 301 https://my-app.com$request_uri; } # https only website server { server_name my-app.com www.my-app.com; listen [::]:80 default_server ipv6only=on; listen 80 default_server; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.

item.title: redirect.conf
item.description: Download map $request_uri $new_uri { /my-app/ "https://my-app.com"; /my-app "https://my-app.com"; default "https://github.com/hellupline"; } server { server_name _; listen [::]:80 default_server ipv6only=on; listen 80 default_server; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main; return 301 $new_uri; }

item.title: static-site.conf
item.description: Download server { server_name _; listen [::]:80 default_server ipv6only=on; listen 80 default_server; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main; sendfile on; sendfile_max_chunk 1m; tcp_nopush on; gzip on; gzip_min_length 1; gzip_types application/xml text/plain; root /usr/share/nginx/html; location / { try_files $uri $uri/ $uri.html =404; index index.html index.htm; } location /public/ { autoindex on; } error_page 404 /404.html; location = /404.html { internal; } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; location = /50x.html { internal; } }
